fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone at night to determine if they are a frog.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Frogs are people who follow a certain trait, decided by the host at the start of the game. You are not informed exactly which trait this is, but you are given a list of three possibilities at the start of the game.
- Twice per game, you may visit two people at night instead of one.
- Frog traits should be something general that could apply to a lot of roles. Examples include:
> - Show suspicious to a (20) Sheriff.
> - Has an even role number.
> - Has a role created by a living player.
> - Has an attack level above None.
> - Has only one ability.
